description: Detects suspicious use of XORDump process memory dumping utility
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
false_positives: Another tool that uses the command line switches of XORdump
name: HackTool - XORDump Execution
query: ((process.executable.text:*\\xordump.exe) OR (process.command_line.text:(*\ \-process\ lsass.exe\ * OR *\ \-m\ comsvcs\ * OR *\ \-m\ dbghelp\ * OR *\ \-m\ dbgcore\ *)))
